title: A Look inside
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Shows different aspects of work inside the Australian National Animal Health Laboratory. After a brief introduction to the importance of the livestock industry and the effects of disease, viewers are taken inside the laboratory to see some of the microbiological features.
creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
